15512111.content:
Being Black Star's weapon isn't the easiest job in the world. Naturally there's going to be a few headache worthy moments down the line, but Tsubaki just powers through them. He can be very headstrong and stubborn at times, but when the situation requires Tsuabki to put her foot down, she will. His ego has gotten him in trouble in the past, but when he does put it aside and focuses on the objective at hand, he can be a very competent meister. When he caused trouble for other people, she would apologize for him when she couldn't get him to. He isn't the most mature member of the DWMA, but it does her heart good when he shows he can be mature. Black Star has a big appetite and can cause huge messes, but Tsubaki doesn't mind cooking for him and likes cleaning, since she's very domestic like that. For what it's worth, being Black Star's weapon can be a huge pain, but Tsubaki is a masochist like that. And some people think she might even be an actual one having to deal with the headaches her meister can cause.

For all of his faults, Black Star is her meister, and she's his weapon. It was going to take a lot to break their bond. Most people would of quit and searched for a new partner, but it was going to take a lot to make Tsubaki want to change partners. But the cracks were starting to form, and when they become too noticeable, it may be too late to seal them. How many cracks or how wide the cracks will it take to brake the base of the foundation?

Class had recently started at the DWMA, and Stein had passed out a couple of worksheets out. Tsubaki figured this is what she needed to get her average up. It wasn't a test, but if it could help she was going to try it. She noticed some students, at least fifteen of them were eyeing Black Star. She figured it was the students he made the bet with. They were going to be in a foul mood when they found out that they lost the bet. Everyone was going to be surprised that Black Star of all people made an eighty. Tsubaki was still surprised, and proud of his achievement, but knew this was going to send him on an ego trip. She had to prepare herself for that. What she hoped she didn't need to prepare for was people asking her about her average if that was released. That might get some rumors that Black Star was actually the smart one, and she didn't need that stress. Black Star on his following ego trip could believe that. And she definitely didn't need that. Then again, she can be paranoid at times, and she's just letting her imagination run wild.

Hours later lunch, Black Star had his arms behind his head, his feet propped on the desk, and a smug grin on his face. He had a feeling he was going to win the bet, that he just knew he won. When Stein tells him he did pass, that smug meister was going to have him at least nine thousand dollars. "Hey, Professor Stein," Black Star said, "can we see those test grades?"

Stein saw that grin on his face. "You want that money don't you, Black Star?"

"He must want those Reaper Chops," said one student siting two rows back.

Black Star turned around and looked back at the student. "You better have money ready, or we're going to have a problem." He said. "And that goes for the rest of you too," he says to the other students he made the bet with.

"Black Star, there's no need for violence," Tsubaki said.

"Do you know how hard I studied? I almost tried to steal the answers from Stein, but I remembered the last time I did that," Black Star says.

"If it would get everything back on track, I can just tell you who won," Stein said getting their attention. "Black Star, you made an 80. Congratulations, you won. Now get your money, and focus on your work."

"Hell yeah, I knew I won! Pay up!" The blue haired meister proudly said.

"Black Star made an 80?" A confused Maka Albarn asked.

"Way to go, Black Star," said Soul.

One of the students that made the bet with Black Star was in disbelief. He had a problem with Black Star, losing, and anger issues that his parents and partner made him go to anger management classes to learn how to control his temper. He was doing well so far, but Black Star had a way to make his blood boil. But losing a bet to Black Star, two of his major pet peeves together? A bet that he was sure that he was going to win at that? That was enough to make him lose his cool.

"Come on, just pay him and be done with it," his partner said.

"There's no way that moron made an 80. He can't focus on anything but himself!"

"Apparently I can, so hand me my money," Black Star said.

"If you don't believe me, come check the grade book," Stein told the student. The sooner everything got back to order, the better.

The student left his seat and walked up to Stein's desk. He found Black Star's name in the grade book. His anger rose more when he saw the test grade and the day before matched up to Black Star's name. "I... I don't believe it," he stuttered.

"Believe it!" Black Star said.

The student's eyes wandered down to Tsubaki's name and saw her grades. Math was one of his best subjects, so he could figure out her average. "What kind of world is this where that idiot can make an 80, but his partner has a 50 average?" He said out loud much to Tsubaki's dismay.

"No." She groaned while putting her head down.

"That's bad, right?" Black Star asked his partner.

"Tsubaki, what's going on?" Maka asked her best friend. Black Star passing a test while Tsubaki had a failing average? That made no sense whatsoever

"I'm under a lot of stress lately, and it's taking a toll on me," she replied. The other students were so confused about what was going on. All that they did know was this had something to do with a bet, and that Black Star had a test score higher than Tsubaki's average.

The students that made the bet with Black Star got up and gave him the money they owed him. All but the one that ratted Tsubaki out.

"Are you going to hand over that money you owe me, or am I going to make you cough it up?" Black Star asked the ill-tempered student.

"Never! You must of cheated! That's only way you could of passed!" He shouted. His partner told him to calm down, and remember what he learned at his anger management classes, but to no avail.

"You can't accept that a guy like me best a sore loser like you," Black Star said edging the student on.

"What did you call me?!" He hated being called that, a loser.

"A sore loser," Black Star replied.

"If you want to settle this, I'll watch the fight." Stein chimed in. He made a note to himself to ask Lord Death to make it against the rules to make bets on test grades.

"Sure, I can beat this guy again," replied Black Star.

"Black Star, just let it go," Tsubaki said. She really didn't want to be in a fight now. She didn't have enough Kishin egg souls eaten to give her that little boost of power they give Demon Weapons. She turned to the student that Black Star made the bet with, and apologized for Black Star. Unfortunately for her he wasn't in the mood for apologies.

"Shut up, you stupid bimbo!" He shouted, shocking Tsubaki.

"You can't talk to my partner like that!" An enraged Black Star said.

"She must be one! She's your partner isn't she? And she must be really stupid to be doing worse than you! And she doesn't seem to mind showing off her goods either, and if those things were bigger, they'd be udders!" He said pointing at Tsubaki's chest. Note: This kind of goes well with Tsubaki's new design. I work with what I got.

"Dude, just calm down," his partner replied. "I'm really sorry about my meister here. He's a really great guy, he just has anger issues."

"Now we're definitely fighting now!" Black Star says.

Both demon weapons groaned, and shook their heads.

info.brief_description: Now an interactive about all of the female characters from Soul Eater.
info.description:
I had this idea, but I forgot about it until my friend, Hamn8r, refreshed my memory when he proposed the idea. like my Akiza story, this is mainly about Maka and making her a better and more attractive meister, and perhaps steal back her weapon's attention from a certain magical catgirl who loves pumpkins.
Basically the same rules as my Akiza interactive. I believe that's it.
Edit: 6/2/14: Now this is an interactive about all of the Soul Eater female characters, and the ones from Soul Eater Not!. Yeah, that's it for now. Female Crona is welcomed.
